Primary Contact: Andrew Greer, Community Catalyst; Email: andrew@purppl.com
Service Details: - Purppl aims to accelerate the development and implementation of social enterprises by providing business models, mentorship, training, etc.- Purppl provides two programs: the Social Enterprise Acceleration (SEA) Program and the Social Enterprise Fundamentals (SoFun) Workshop- The SEA Program is a six month acceleration program to give startup tools and ongoing strategic mentoring- The SoFun Workshop provides in-person education on startup tools, contextual examples from other social enterprises and exercises to aid in the development of one's social enterprise
